reviews.title: Outstanding food!!!
reviews.text: Ok, so we did not stay at this hotel but the restaurant DEFINITELY deserves a mention. My husband and I went here for our first wedding anniversary - we were staying in Bovec at the time and the hotel we were staying at (Dobra Vila) were kind enough to make the reservation for us.

reviews.title: A little gem of an inn in a diamond of a country!
reviews.text: The food is simply divine. It is expensive by Slovenian standard, but there is good reason for it. Plus, for people in the UK it was no more expensive than having a 3 course meal with wine anywhere else!
